articles.title: A California bill that would regulate AI companion chatbots is close to becoming law
articles.description: If SB 243 is enacted, California would become the first state to require operators to implement safety protocols for AI companions and hold companies
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Perplexity reportedly raised $200M at $20B valuation
articles.description: The AI-powered search startup's valuation jumped from $18 billion two months earlier.
articles.author: Marina Temkin
